attributes.action: Forced resignation of Boris Johnson due to his mis-handling of the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The Government must act quickly to reduce the number of daily deaths so we as a country don’t reach any other significant milestones. Boris Johnson has failed to protect the country from these milestones and therefore should be replaced by someone more fit for the role. The aim for this is to quickly and effectively bring in a leader who will make correct decisions, listen to the science and protect the public, the government need to remove to PM from his position and allow it to change hands.
attributes.background: As of the day of writing, 27/01/21, the UK coronavirus death toll is over 100,000, this is unacceptable. Under the grounds of personal and collective ministerial responsibility I am requesting Boris Johnson resign from his position as Prime Minister.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
